Uses of Class
laazotea.indi.driver.INDIProperty

  • Packages that use INDIProperty 
    Package Description
    laazotea.indi.driver
    Provides the classes necessary to create INDI Drivers, their Properties and Elements to which the INDI Clients may connect.

    • Uses of INDIProperty in laazotea.indi.driver

      Subclasses of INDIProperty in laazotea.indi.driver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  INDIBLOBProperty
      A class representing a INDI BLOB Property.
      class  INDILightProperty
      A class representing a INDI Light Property.
      class  INDINumberProperty
      A class representing a INDI Number Property.
      class  INDIOneElementBLOBProperty
      A class representing a INDI BLOB Property with only one BLOB Element (with the same name and label of the Property).
      class  INDIOneElementLightProperty
      A class representing a INDI Light Property with only one Light Element (with the same name and label of the Property).
      class  INDIOneElementNumberProperty
      A class representing a INDI Number Property with only one Number Element (with the same name and label of the Property).
      class  INDIOneElementTextProperty
      A class representing a INDI Text Property with only one Text Element (with the same name and label of the Property).
      class  INDIPortProperty
      A class representing a the standard INDI PORT Property.
      class  INDISwitchOneOfManyProperty
      A class representing a INDI One Of Many Switch Property.
      class  INDISwitchOneOrNoneProperty
      A class representing a INDI One or None Switch Property (aka a simple button).
      class  INDISwitchProperty
      A class representing a INDI Switch Property.
      class  INDITextProperty
      A class representing a INDI Text Property.
      Methods in laazotea.indi.driver that return INDIProperty 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      INDIProperty INDIElement.getProperty()
      Gets the Property to which this Element belongs.
      protected INDIProperty INDIDriver.getProperty(java.lang.String propertyName)
      Gets a Property of the Driver given its name.
      protected static INDIProperty INDIProperty.loadFromFile(INDIDriver driver, java.lang.String propertyName)
      Loads a property from a file.
      Methods in laazotea.indi.driver that return types with arguments of type INDIProperty 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<INDIProperty> INDIDriver.getPropertiesAsList()
      Gets a list of all the Properties in the Driver.
      Methods in laazotea.indi.driver with parameters of type INDIProperty 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void INDIDriver.addProperty(INDIProperty property)
      Adds a new Property to the Device.
      protected void INDIDriver.addProperty(INDIProperty property, java.lang.String message)
      Adds a new Property to the Device with a message to the client.
      protected void INDIDriver.removeProperty(INDIProperty property)
      Removes a Property from the Device.
      protected void INDIDriver.removeProperty(INDIProperty property, java.lang.String message)
      Removes a Property from the Device with a message.
      protected void INDIDriver.updateProperty(INDIProperty property)
      Notifies the clients about the property and its values.
      protected void INDIDriver.updateProperty(INDIProperty property, java.lang.String message)
      Notifies the clients about the property and its values with an additional message.
      Constructors in laazotea.indi.driver with parameters of type INDIProperty 
      Constructor and Description
      INDIElement(INDIProperty property, java.lang.String name)
      Constructs an instance of INDIElement with a label equal to its name.
      INDIElement(INDIProperty property, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String label)
      Constructs an instance of INDIElement.
